mapper.select: SELECT no , title , poster , rownum FROM (SELECT no , title , poster FROM recipedetail ORDER BY hit DESC ) WHERE rownum <=12
SELECT no, poster, title, chef, info1, info2, info3, content, rownum FROM (SELECT no, poster, title, chef, info1, info2, info3, content FROM recipedetail ORDER BY likecount DESC ) WHERE rownum <=9
SELECT no , title , poster , rownum FROM (SELECT no , title , poster FROM recipedetail ORDER BY jjimcount DESC ) WHERE rownum <=12
SELECT no,title,poster, chef, info3, num FROM (SELECT no,title,poster, chef, info3, rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,title,poster, chef, info3 FROM recipedetail)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT no, poster, title, chef, chef_poster, chef_profile, info1, info2, info3, content, foodmake, data FROM recipedetail WHERE no=#{no}
SELECT no , title , poster , chef, info3, rownum FROM (SELECT no , title , poster, chef, info3 FROM recipedetail WHERE chef LIKE '%'||#{ress}||'%' ORDER BY no ASC) WHERE rownum <=12

SELECT no , title , poster , num FROM (SELECT no , title , poster , rownum as num FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(recipe RD_NO_PK)*/ no , title, poster FROM recipedetail WHERE chef LIKE '%'||#{ress}||'%')) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/20.0) FROM recipedetail WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{ress}||'%'
